importData(Institution) - Method in class trabalho_pp.io.ImporterImpl
Reads the input JSON file This function import all the data from the json file (if there is any content inside), otherwise imports the data from the web API and add this information to the given institution

importMeasurements(Institution, String) - Static method in class trabalho_pp.Data.APImethods
We use the json library to get all the information about the measurements in the API, we create an instance of MeasurementImpl with all the information and add them to the containers of the Institution.
importToInstitution(Institution, String) - Static method in class trabalho_pp.Data.APImethods
We create an array of aidboxes importing all aidboxes from json and we add them to the given institution.
increaseArray() - Method in class trabalho_pp.distances.Distances
Increase the capacity of the distances array, to the double of the current capacity in order to do this we create a temporary array with the new size, and then we copy the old array to the newest one.
